name: InSET
short_description: InSET is an inline content management system with a password protected editor. It does this by providing content areas (eg: text, pictures, slideshows, menus) that are defined with an InSET tag. e.g.<? InSET("txt","obj=file&src=aboutus1.php"); ?>
